{
    "name": "restaurants",  
    "fields": [
        {"name": "restaurantId", "type": "Edm.String", "key": true, "searchable": false, "sortable": false, "facetable": false},

        {"name": "location", "type": "Edm.GeographyPoint"},
        {"name": "street", "type": "Edm.String"},
        {"name": "city", "type": "Edm.String"},
        {"name": "state", "type": "Edm.String"},
        {"name": "zipcode", "type": "Edm.Int32"},
        {"name": "parkingAvailable", "type": "Edm.Boolean", "sortable": false},
        {"name": "smokingAllowed", "type": "Edm.Boolean", "sortable": false},

}

{
    "count": true,
    "search": "*",
    "select": "name, location, street, city, state, zipcode",
    "orderby": "name asc",
    "skip": 0,
    "top": 25
}

{
    "count": true,
    "search": "*",
    "select": "name, location, street, city, state, zipcode",
    "orderby": "geo.distance(location,geography'POINT(-81.62932633386299 28.476882053634096 )') asc, name asc",
    "skip": 0,
    "top": 25,
    "filter" : "geo.distance(location,geography'POINT(-81.62932633386299 28.476882053634096)') le 6.30"
}
